mapper.select: SELECT STU_NO, NAME, KOR, ENG, MAT, AVG, GRADE FROM STUDENT ORDER BY STU_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STUDENT(STU_NO, NAME, KOR, ENG, MAT, AVG, GRADE) VALUES (STUDENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{name}, #{kor}, #{eng}, #{mat}, #{avg}, #{grade})
mapper.update: UPDATE STUDENT SET NAME = #{name}, KOR = #{kor}, ENG = #{eng}, MAT = #{mat}, AVG = #{avg}, GRADE = #{grade} WHERE STU_NO = #{stuNo}
